column2: Higher wages can have negative consequences on small businesses that might not be able to afford such an increase.
column3: Increased minimum wage could result in job losses due to automation or reduced demand for labor.
column4: Implementing a higher minimum wage can address income inequality and provide a better standard of living for workers.
column5: Raising the minimum wage might have negative consequences on the economy, such as causing inflation or reduced benefits.
column6: Higher minimum wages could result in positive changes, and some argue for even greater increases.
